casebody.data:
Steve CHABOT, et al., Appellants,
v.
OHIO A. PHILIP RANDOLPH INSTITUTE, et al. No. 19-110 Supreme Court of the United States. October 7, 2019

Motion of Stephen M. Shapiro for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Judgment vacated, and cases remanded to the United States District Court for the Southern District of Ohio for further consideration in light of Rucho v. Common Cause , 588 U.S. ----, 139 S.Ct. 2484, 204 L.Ed.2d 931 (2019).
